title: Squire armor
summaries: Squire armor is a Hardmode armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 450000*45 [img:Defender Medal] in total after defeating any mechanical boss, and provides summon as well as melee damage bonuses. The set consists of the Squire's Great Helm, Squire's Plating, and Squire's Greaves.
A full set of Squire armor provides the following stats:

• +58 defense
  • +15% melee damage
  • +30% summon damage
  • +15% melee critical strike chance
  • +15% movement speed
  • +2 HP/second health regeneration
  • +2 sentry slots

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the <linked>velocity</linked> of the projectiles of the <linked>Ballista sentry summons</linked> and will increase the maximum number of enemies that can be pierced by them from 3 to 6. It also grants the wearer the <linked>Ballista Panic!</linked> <linked>buff</linked> upon taking any damage, which further increases the fire rate of all Ballista sentries summoned by the player for 5 seconds.
The <linked>Valhalla Knight armor</linked> can be considered a direct upgrade of the Squire armor.
